definitions.definition: Having already happened; in the past; finished.
Following expressions of time to indicate how long ago something happened; ago .
Of a period of time: having just gone by; previous .
Of a tense, expressing action that has already happened or a previously-existing state.

main_definition: Having already happened; in the past; finished. [from 14th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( postmodifier ) Following expressions of time to indicate how long ago something happened; ago . [from 15th c.]
Of a period of time: having just gone by; previous . [from 15th c.]
( grammar ) Of a tense, expressing action that has already happened or a previously-existing state. [from 18th c.]
